snippet: The cleric Hassan Mustafa Osama Nasr was kidnapped in Milan as part of the American “extraordinary rendition” program and flown to Egypt, where he says he was tortured.
abstract: Appeals court in Milan sentences former military intelligence chief Nicolo Pollari to 10 years in prison for his role in CIA abduction of Egyptian Muslim cleric Hassan Mustafa Osama Nasr under rendition program begun after Sept 11 terrorist attacks.
lead_paragraph: The cleric Hassan Mustafa Osama Nasr was kidnapped in Milan as part of the American “extraordinary rendition” program and flown to Egypt, where he says he was tortured.

headline.seo: Former Italian Military Officials Sentenced in Abduction of Abu Omar
